title: Senior Developer Interview

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: Can you explain your design for a scalable service?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: I would use microservices with autoscaling and a load balancer to distribute traffic.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: How would you handle data consistency?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: We can use distributed transactions or eventual consistency with conflict resolution.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: What caching strategy would you implement?

summary: Interviewed candidate on system design and problem solving. Recommended follow-up.
